00001 //=============================================================================
00002 /*! _dcovector*drovector operator */
00003 inline _dgematrix operator*(const _dcovector& covec, const drovector& rovec)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const _dcovector&, const drovector&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if(covec.L!=rovec.L){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator*(const _dcovector&, const drovector&)"
00013               << std::endl
00014               << "These two vectors can not make a product." << std::endl
00015               << "Your input was (" << covec.L << ") * (" << rovec.L << ")."
00016               << std::endl;
00017     exit(1);
00018   }
00019 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00020   
00021   dgematrix newmat(covec.L, covec.L);
00022   for(long i=0; i<newmat.m; i++){
00023     for(long j=0; j<newmat.n; j++){
00024       newmat(i,j) =covec(i)*rovec(j);
00025     }
00026   }
00027   
00028   covec.destroy();
00029   return _(newmat);
00030 }
